title: Applied Political Econ
description: Roles of markets and government in allocating resources.  Rational choice approaches to understanding policy.  Institutional design.  Growth and sustainability.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PUBP 2010 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and PUBP 2030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ECON 2106 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
